name: Mob Shift
description: Mob Shift is a replica of the Brain Shift game by Tiger Electronics. It once was a handheld game, but now it's a game made in Unity. It has six game modes and each game can be played up to 6 players. The game will be available for PC and Mac and is also available on the iOS store for $1.99. The new version of Mob Shift will be available sometime in 2019.
